entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023
